overview: Lose weight and keep it off by combining the Weight Watchers Program and regular exercise.  Start with an easy-to-follow warm-up, *Followed by three 6-minute segments that combine calorie-burning aerobics with resistance moves that will tone both the upper and lower body, *End with a relaxed cool-down and stretching. This is the high intensity workout called Get Fit!
tagline: Weight Watchers - Get Fit! - High Intensity
title: Get In Shape: Get Fit!
